mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, M.* FROM ( SELECT meeting_no, user_no, meetingtype_no, area_no, book_class_no, meeting_title, meeting_content, meeting_rcr_start, meeting_rcr_end, meeting_start, meeting_end, meeting_personnel, meeting_kakaotalk, meeting_board_date, meeting_approved FROM meeting ORDER BY meeting_no DESC) M) R WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo }

SELECT meeting_no, user_no, meetingtype_no, area_no, book_class_no, meeting_title, meeting_content, meeting_rcr_start, meeting_rcr_end, meeting_start, meeting_end, meeting_personnel, meeting_kakaotalk, meeting_board_date, meeting_approved FROM meeting WHERE meeting_no = #{meeting_no }
